basics.name: Clinton Langosch
basics.label: Software Engineer | @newrelic
basics.summary: Software engineering leader with a full-stack background. Steeped in CMS development, in-product help, and services that connect them. I currently manage a small team of software engineers at New Relic.
basics.headline: Builder and life-long learner  B-)

projects.name: docs-website
projects.description:
- React.js based static site generated (SSG) with Gatsby
- CI / CD workflows and deployment
- Includes migration tooling from Drupal to markdown/MDX based content 
- Human / machine translation tooling / workflows
- Central repo for Docs as a Service (DaaS) data / endpoints
projects.summary: React.js / Node.js based, open source static site for for all things New Relic docs / help content

projects.name: developer-website
projects.description:
- React.js based static site generated (SSG) with Gatsby
- CI / CD workflows and deployment
- Interactive docs for New Relic UI platform SDK
- Includes embeddable pages for reusing guides in other New Relic sites
projects.summary: React.js / Node.js based, open source static site for in-depth, developer-focused content for New Relic APIs, platform tools, developer advocacy, etc.

projects.name: gatsby-theme-newrelic
projects.description:
- Serves as a utility / component library for all New Relic Gatsby sites to unify look and feel and functionality
- CI / CD workflows and deployment to NPM
- Includes a global header and federated search UI across all New Relic websites
- Includes internationalization utilities / components
projects.summary: A demo site + NPM package that serves as a central component / utility library for all New Relic Gatsby sites

projects.name: opensource-website
projects.description:
- React.js based static site generated (SSG) with Gatsby
- CI / CD workflows and deployment
- Includes sourcing lots of github data for hundreds of New Relic's open source projects
projects.summary: React.js / Node.js based, open source static site for exploring New Relic's open source program and its projects.

work.name: New Relic
work.summary: Lead a team engineers that powers sites / services around technical content, product documentation, and opensource projects to help customers get the most out of New Relic.

work.name: New Relic
work.summary: Develop sites and services around technical content, product documentation, and opensource projects to enable developers to get the most out of our product.
highlights: Serve as technical product manager to help develop roadmap and provide technical input into strategic decisions, prioritize backlog, prototype, scope and plan upcoming work,
Develop services we call 'Docs as a Service' to empower authors to surface help content in our product UI.
Migrate from large Drupal site to open sourced GitHub + React (Gatsby) static site.
Develop and maintain automated translation workflows / tooling to localize content into many different languages.

work.name: New Relic
work.summary: Develop Drupal-based content management system on front and back end.
highlights: Lead 'Docs as a Service' initaitive to build out REST API / JSON resources to enable other teams to integrate with our site and our product UI.
Develop prototype of product UI component in React to surface search results from disparate sites.
Develop integration to translate site in Japanese.

work.name: Freelance
work.summary: Develop WordPress and custom PHP sites for various clients for marketing, portfolios, project management needs.
